name: The Night With Tumble
description:
Try to survive one night with Tumble in this FNaF fangame.

Featuring:

  • Unique, never before seen ways to defend yourself (hopefully)
  • Pixels, pixels and more pixels. (Pixel art)
  • No need to read any kind of tutorial, everything you need to know is there.
  • An original soundtrack.
  • An Extras menu.
  • 2 Minigames.
  • A Custom Night.
  • An actual pause menu.

Well, what are you waiting for? Tumble's waiting for you.

CREDITS----------
